Soraka's supposed to be the leagues best healer,yet when she's strong she's really oppressive to play against.

Riven on the  other hand,has a high movement speed,4 abilities that make her more mobile,no resource management and 1 hard CC skills.
I'm not saying she's OP,but she has a design that  could prove to be quite problematic in the future.

Yes, Riven can be a bit much when it comes to mobility, but comparing Riven to Mordekaiser is apples and oranges. Riven is meant to be mobile, and is such, is fast. Mordekaiser is meant to be slow, and as such, is slow. It's like asking "Why is the rabbit faster than this snail" and then asking for the snail's speed to be buffed.

Riven is like Kled or Fiora, they like to go full damage, with maybe 1 defensive item. She is certainly not tanky, but she the "tanky"ness a fighter would have, because that is what she is, a fighter. 

And you say "inefficiently" buying stats, but what Champion does that? Fighters use that health and Armor/MR to survive, and build AD and lifesteal all the same. Mages buy all their desirable stats, with maybe grabbing a Guardian angel, and same goes with Tanks and ADC's. Kled and fiora cant go 1 defensive item with full damage. Just some "fun" statistics on Morde! 

Mordekaiser has:

Less base HP than Soraka throughout the entire game
Less base Armor than Soraka throughout the entire game
Less base HP at level 18 than Sona
The 2nd lowest HP regen at level 1, Soraka being the lowest
The lowest HP regen at level 18

The lowest base HP throughout the entire game of all melee champions (excluding unmounted Kled)
The lowest Armor at level 1 of all melee champions

Melee champions with 325 Movement speed: Mordekaiser, Nautilus, Blitzcrank. 2 of these have lots of CC in their kit.
Melee champions with 330 Movement speed: Alistar, Gragas, Ivern. Once again, CC!

However, he has:

The highest base AD at level 18, being 146. This is followed closely by Illaoi (145), Yorick (142), and Darius (140.8).

Hopefully, his rework gives him normal base stats, because they're pretty garbage in the state they're in now.
